Target_AMER_Storm_Ethereal.Description: Erratic projectiles from distant planes bombard a 5m radius around target point. When cast, and at the end of each of your turns thereafter for 2 turns, up to 5 projectiles fall directly upon each of up to 5 randomly chosen characters in the radius, dealing 45% Fire, Water, Earth, or Poison damage in a 1m radius (allies are instead struck with healing energy for (50 Qualifier) Vitality). If there are fewer than 5 characters in the affected area, projectiles strike random points within the radius until all have fallen. May be moved once each turn for 1AP. Source Infusions: 1: +1 turn duration. 2 (requires 5 Summoning): +3 strikes. Strikes now apply up to Terrified II for 2 turns. 3 (requires 9 Summoning): Summon an Incarnate at target point and grant it Warp Infusion, it does not count against your summon limit.

Target_AMER_Acclimate.Description: Target a surface in range, and apply the corresponding skin to yourself for 2 turns, which grants immunity to some statuses, +40% resistance to at least one element, -15% to another, and causes you to bleed surfaces. Water/Ice: Brittle immune, resist Water, weak to Fire, bleed ice. Fire: Scorched immune, resist Fire, weak to Water, bleed fire. Electrified: Charged immune, resist Air, weak to Earth, bleed electrified water. Oil/Poison: Calcifying/Poisoned immune, resist Earth/Poison, weak to Air, bleed poison. Source Infusions: 1: Grants +10% (+2% per Polymorph) resistance of the type chosen. 2 (requires 5 Polymorph): Grants 5% (+1% per Polymorph) maximum resistance of the type chosen. +1 turn duration. 3 (requires 9 Polymorph): Apply to all allies within 13m. Recover 1SP.
